name: Lonia Saga 2
description: Lonia Saga 2 is a Rogue-like game that explores various items and skills in the dungeon with a nice side-scrolling action RPG of beautiful dot design.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowXP Processor: 1.6Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 7900 GT Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: It is recommended to use SSD
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 Processor: 2.4Gz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 660 Ti Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: It is recommended to use SSD
